allowInet.name: Access Internet
allowInet.desc: Allows this plugin to access the internet to render remote MD files.

allowInline.name: Allows access to the inline command
allowInline.desc: Enables the !!!inline command, which allows arbitrary HTML code to run (insecure)

recursionDepth.name: Recusion Depth
recursionDepth.desc: Sets the amount of nested imports that can be called.

useCacheForFiles.name: Cache Local Files
useCacheForFiles.desc: Cache files instead of loading them on every rerender. (Remote Files will always be cached)

cacheRefreshTime.name: Cache Refresh Time (miliseconds)
cacheRefreshTime.desc: Cached filed called over this time ago will be refreshed when rendered.
